ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh do I ever wish no drop meant you couldn t drop it, and not that you couldn t pick it up again if you did. Peace Evulia, who ran all the way across EC and
ygData.messageBody:
Oh do I ever wish "no drop" meant you couldn't drop it, and not that you
couldn't pick it up again if you did.

Peace
Evulia, who ran all the way across EC and into WC then discovered she'd
dropped her lute at the tunnel entrance. I was amazed to find it still
there when I got back.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 11:22 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!
>
>
> WOO HOO
>
> A No Drop Drum...
>
> Guess I know what I'm doing tonight.
>
> Draelon
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 11:15 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!
>
>
> > From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
>
> > Well - they fixed a broken quest - and CHEER! It's for a Bard
> > Instrument!
> > M
> > A
> > N
> > D
> > A
> > T
> > O
> > R
> > Y
> >
> > S
> > P
> > O
> > I
> > L
> > E
> > R
> >
> > S
> > P
> > A
> > C
> > E
> >
> >
> > The Rare Coin Quest in Firiona Vie results in the Nostrolo
> > Tambourine - +5
> > INT, no drop lore item. Appears to add 20% to the effects of
> > percussion
> > songs...
> >
>
> But does it look like a drum stick??? Or can we now strum a
> tamborine?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
>
